headline: VeriSign (NasdaqGS:VRSN) Amends Bylaws To Limit Officer Liability Under Delaware Law
summary: VeriSign (NasdaqGS:VRSN) recently amended its Restated Certificate of Incorporation to limit officer liability per Delaware law, a decision possibly influencing its 22% share price increase over the last quarter. This change, detailed in the company's Proxy Statement, coincided with solid Q1 2025 earnings, which showed a rise in both sales and net income. These developments likely bolstered investor confidence amid broader market declines, in which major indexes like the Nasdaq Composite fell...
